result.execSummary:
The defendant Robert L. Reamer was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Robert L. Reamer is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Robert L. Reamer was found guilty of Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Shall pay fine and costs within 60 days or as payment plan established with Clerk of Courts office

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

records.addlTxt: Dodge Cty DNA Proof of Submission

Defendant Robert L. Reamer in court with attorney Eugene Joseph Kirschbaum.  Robert G. Barrington appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court questions defendant and reviews chg & pens and plea agreement; discussion held re Alford plea; no contest plea is entered; Court accepts plea and finds defendant guity of count 2 w/o penalty enhancer; Count 1 is ordered dismissed; parties make sentencing arguments; defendant is sworn & testifies; Court heard and sentence is imposed:

$100 + costs w/i 60 days or as payment plan established w/clek of courts office or shall serve 10 days in the Dodge County Jail consecutive with h&t
Jury trial on September 23, 2015 at 08:30 am.

State Public Defender Determination - Not Eligible
State Public Defender Determination - not eligible
Review hearing on May 13, 2015 at 08:15 am.

(2:07) Defendant, Robert L. Reamer in court w/out counseol, Robert G. Barrington appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Def. heard; Court questions on counsel; Discussion held; plea to DC and D&RI battery with probation; Def. refuses probation; Court instructs Def. to go to SPD (Def. not working right now); RH 5/13/15 at 8:15 in Br. 3; JT remains; bond cont.

Defendant shall not have any direct or indirect contact or communication with TJR dob 7/27/75, her children or her residence.   Defendant shall have his/her fingerprints and photographs taken at the Dodge County Sheriff's Department, Jail Division.

9:20 - Defendant, Robert L. Reamer in court, Robert G. Barrington appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Defendant has received copy of Criminal Complaint and advised of rights, charges and penalties. Court finds probable cause. Court enters Not Guilty plea for defendant. RD & JT set. Court sets $500 PA bond with conditions:   Defendant shall have his/her fingerprints and photographs taken at the Dodge County Sheriff's Department, Jail Division. Defendant shall not have any direct or indirect contact or communication with TJR dob 7/27/75, her children or her residence.  Return date scheduled for May 4, 2015 at 01:30 pm.  Jury trial scheduled for June 17, 2015 at 08:30 am.
